prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon that resembles a poodle with bright colors and a playful personality.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon with a stylish coat and a charming demeanor in an urban setting.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a dog with elegant features and a vibrant color palette.
